title: Becky Vardy opens up on supporting Coleen Rooney through marriage problems with Wayne
text:

Rebekah Vardy says she feels completely betrayed by Coleen Rooney's savage takedown of her - especially after she's supported her fellow WAG during the most testing time in her marriage.

In her first interview since Coleen's explosive Twitter post accused her of leaking stories about her, Becky has insisted she's totally innocent and is mystified by her former friend decision to 'annihilate her' in the press.

Becky, 37, says she has always been totally loyal to the Rooney family after forging a friendship with Coleen at the Euro Football Championships in 2016.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

She says that she was even there for Coleen during a wave of bad publicity and private turmoil when Wayne was convicted of drink driving in 2017.

Wayne was given a two year driving ban and ordered to complete community service after being caught over the limit behind the wheel of the car belonging to Laura Simpson, who he had met in a bar the same night.

At the time Coleen decided to stick by Wayne but says there were times when she thought her marriage might be over.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

(Image: Daily Mirror)

Becky says she was a loyal friend to Coleen, who was pregnant at the time, as she dealt with the scandal.

"We have always got on and that is what makes it all the more difficult. For instance, I messaged her when Wayne was in trouble over the drink-driving. I have been a supportive friend," Rebekah told the Daily Mail.

(Image: REX/Shutterstock)

(Image: PA)

"She sent me a gift when my youngest Finlay was born [in January 2017] and I sent her a present when her baby Cass arrived [in February 2018]. There was never any hint of any bad blood between us or any hint that she had a suspicion about me.

"I have always been very supportive of her," she adds. "But as much as I sympathise with Coleen and the situation in which she found herself, I don't understand why she couldn't call me before posting it on social media and basically completely finishing my reputation and bringing all of this raining down on me."

(Image: Instagram)

In a blistering attack Becky also compared Coleen to a pigeon saying she can tell her she's wrong but she'll still 's*** in her hair.'

The wife of footballer Jamie Vardy also said Coleen's actions have gone way 'way beyond an apology' but she's still determined to prove her innocence.

Rebekah said she has hired forensic experts to look into Coleen's claims that her Instagram account was the only one to see her private stories.

This week Coleen told fans how she turned super sleuth to out Becky Vardy after becoming suspicious she was leaking details of her family life to the newspapers.
description: Rebekah Vardy said she feels utterly betrayed by Coleen Rooney after being a loyal family friend for years
